summary: A college freshman encounters new friends, romance, and adventure upon her arrival at campus.
cast: Mark Chao|Geng Han|Zishan Yang|Shuying Jiang|Bei-Er Bao|Ryan Zheng|Yao Zhang|Yase Liu|Zhe Gong|Hong Han|Youming Huang|Gang Jiao|Mingzhu Li|Hong Pan|Liya Tong|Sen Wang|Lan Yang|Liping You
title: Zhi wo men zhong jiang shi qu de qing chun
